Instructions: **Alpha**: A, B, T, W, C, H\n**Email**: alexis.flores@arrow.com
**Alpha**: I, J, K, E, F, #, signs, D, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z\n**Email**: iliana.robles@arrow.com
Rationale: Handles Special Chars and Alpha Group I-Z.

Instructions: **Alpha**: L, P, M, N, O, R, G\n**Email**: valeria.sanchez@arrow.com
1. Search SO# in 'Digital Customer Tab'.\n2. View: Summary notes, vendor name, status, and internal tracking.
1. Search order confirmation number in Salesforce.\n2. Review cases handled by Support or OMT to avoid duplicate work.
Rationale: Verifying if a task is already in progress.

Instructions: 1. Open Digital Customer section from Customer Tab.\n2. Click order line to view 'OMT Action Notes'.\n3. Note: Alert releases cannot be expedited.
Rationale: Identifying specific hold causes like Price or High Value.

Instructions: Triggered when the line price is below cost or margin threshold. Requires OMT/Asset review.
Triggered when order total exceeds vetting thresholds. Requires manual review.
1. My Customer > Check Core Acct.\n2. Verify Bill-to and Ship-to details match.\n3. Review OMT Action Notes for specific instructions.
Rationale: Ensuring data integrity before alert release.

Instructions: 1. ETQ Portal > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'.\n2. Whse: V72. Host: AC Prod.\n3. Note: 'Please arrange shipment for DID provided. Picked/Released since [DATE].'
Rationale: Expediting Reno orders stuck for >2 days.

Instructions: 1. ETQ > 'Sure Ship International - Draft'.\n2. Use when tracking is missing in Unity/SWB for shipped international orders.
Rationale: Expediting cross-dock orders at Reno hub.

Instructions: 1. ETQ > 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'.\n2. Required: Supplier PO, Carrier, Tracking, Arrival Date.\n3. Trick: If DHL 'Signed By' is unknown, enter 'N/A'.
Rationale: For items delivered but 'Awaiting Receipt' for >3 days.

Instructions: 1. Open Salesforce Case.\n2. Email: URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.\n3. Body: Supplier PO, SO, Supplier, Tracking, Carrier, Arrival Date, MPN, Qty.
1. Sure Ship: Email ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com and Helpdeskvenlo.dlc.emea@arrow.com.\n2. Receiving: Email business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com.
1. MyConnect > 'Warehouse IT Support - WMS'.\n2. Provide: DID, Whse Code, and Pick Status.\n3. Use for: Packing list reprints or printer errors.
Rationale: Technical support for warehouse label systems.

Instructions: 1. MyConnect > 'Report a Digital Issue'.\n2. Provide: URL, Screenshot, WEB-SO, and User Email.

1. Find unpaid order from 'DROPSHIP REPORT'.
2. Create new SO (Same info, MFR: MOLEX_WAL).
3. Set Resale to $0.00 and remove Freight.
4. Apply hold: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER] for PO Cancellation'.
Rationale: Paying 3rd party suppliers when original SO is unbilled.

Instructions: 1. Get PO# from Info > Drop Ship (after 30m).\n2. Email: delink and rematch invoices@arrow.com (CC Sophia Ciarlo).\n3. Body: 'Hello - Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUMBER] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice #[NUMBER].'
Rationale: Linking new POs to supplier invoices.

Instructions: 1. Email 3rd party (Waldom: Kellys@waldom.com / Air Electro: LBuckley@airelectro.com).\n2. Subject: Dropship Order D[NUMBER] - Please cancel.\n3. Template: 'Please cancel PO#[NUMBER] ([QTY] pcs / PN [PART] / Customer: [NAME]).'
Rationale: Voiding old POs to prevent double payment.

Instructions: Teams message PEI regarding daily cancellations for 5 replacement POs from 10/16-10/21.
Rationale: Manual cancellation tracking for PEI Genesis.

Instructions: 1. Email: verical-logistics@verical.com (CC amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com).\n2. Template: 'Requesting MFG CoC for WEB-SO: / PO: / DID: / MPN: / Line: / Regards.'
1. Reno Packing List: https://wms-prod.arrow.com/PAWMSReprints/\n2. Non-Military CoC: https://arrow.tfaforms.net/4865283\n3. Military Parts: arrowcrm.my.salesforce-sites.com/arrowservices
Click the order result line to open the panel with 'OMT Action Notes'. Use these notes for specific instructions on alert releases.
Rationale: Standard procedure for finding hold details.

Instructions: Triggered when the order total is very high and requires credit review or OMT verification.
Alerts are released by OMT once vetting is complete. If the 'Core Acct' shows a 'Manual Hold', check Salesforce first.
When checking Reno orders, verify if 'Pick Status' is Released. If stuck >48 hours, use ETQ Sure Ship Domestic.
When creating a replacement SO, the MFR field must match the third-party supplier (e.g., MOLEX_WAL).
Apply hold immediately after booking: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER] for PO Cancellation'.
